member.name: M:BrontoTransactionalEndpoint.Controllers.TransactController.OrderConfirmation(BrontoLibrary.Models.Order)
member.summary: Sends an Order Confirmation Email via the Bronto Platform
member.remarks: returns a string with the details of the Email Send attempt
member.param: For field names and datatypes, please reference BrontoLibrary Order Model, or the model on swagger

member.name: M:BrontoTransactionalEndpoint.Controllers.TransactController.UpdateContact(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.remarks: returns a string with the details of the updateContact call
member.param: A Json object of the contact you wish to update. Fields that get updated: SalesRepFirstName, SalesRepLastName, SalesRepDirectLine, SalesRepImageUrlSmall, SalesRepImageUrlLarge, SalesRepEmail, SalesRepTitle, CallLogTimeStamp
